title: "Self-driving road sweepers to go on trial at one-north, NTU and CleanTech Park in Jurong"
excerpt: "SINGAPORE: Two self-driving road sweepers will go on trial at one-north, Nanyang Technological University (NTU) and CleanTech Park, said the National Environment Agency (NEA) and the Ministry of Transport (MOT) in a joint media release on Wednesday (Jan 13)."
